SEARCH
Module JNewton
Package crab.newton

Class NewtonWorld

java.lang.Object
crab.newton.NewtonWorld
public class NewtonWorld extends Object
NewtonWorld relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • NewtonWorld refers to one or more preview APIs: MemoryLayout, MemorySegment, SegmentScope.
Programs can only use NewtonWorld when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.

  • Field Details

    • address

      protected final MemorySegmentPREVIEW address

  • Constructor Details

    • NewtonWorld

      public NewtonWorld(MemorySegmentPREVIEW address)
      public constructor of the NewtonWorld class. This constructor is mainly meant to be used internally or with methods that return raw pointers to a NewtonWorld object. Users of this class should create a NewtonWorld with the NewtonWorld.create() method.
      Parameters:
      address - address of the NewtonWorld object
